decks.notes: The main strategy of this combo-reanimator Legacy deck is to quickly fill your graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Brainstorm, and then bring them back to the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. The deck also includes cards like Force of Will and Daze to protect your combo pieces, as well as disruptive spells like Thoughtseize to disrupt your opponent's game plan. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage and helps dig for key combo pieces. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm your opponent with massive threats and efficient card advantage.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Show and Tell combo to cheat out powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Atraxa, Grand Unifier onto the battlefield. It also includes cards like Thundering Falls and Sneak Attack to further support this strategy. The deck also includes cards like Force of Will and Chalice of the Void for defense and disruption. Additionally, cards like Omniscience and Cunning Wish provide additional flexibility and options for the player. The key strategy is to quickly bring out high-impact creatures and overwhelm the opponent in order to secure victory.

The deck aims to control the game by using counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to disrupt the opponent's game plan. It also utilizes a variety of planeswalkers and creatures to generate card advantage and provide additional control options. The inclusion of cards like Back to Basics and Magus of the Moon further stalls the opponent's resources while the deck's land base ensures consistent mana access. Overall, the deck focuses on maintaining board control, disrupting the opponent's strategy, and outlasting them in a battle of attrition.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize cards like Mystic Forge and Tezzeret, Cruel Captain to generate a powerful combo that allows for fast and efficient mana ramping and card advantage. The deck also heavily relies on artifacts like Grim Monolith and Lotus Petal to cast high-cost spells like Karn, the Great Creator and Urza's Saga. Additionally, cards like Basalt Monolith and Voltaic Key provide additional mana acceleration, while Pithing Needle and Portable Hole help control the opponent's board. Overall, this deck focuses on assembling a potent combo engine to overwhelm opponents quickly.

This deck focuses on dealing damage quickly and efficiently by utilizing aggressive creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent. It also includes counterspells like Daze and Force of Will to protect its threats. The deck aims to control the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Wasteland and Force of Negation. Additionally, it uses card selection spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure consistent draws. The mana base is optimized with fetch lands like Scalding Tarn and flexible dual lands to provide the necessary color fixing.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Recruiter of the Guard and Stoneforge Mystic, backed up by disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Swords to Plowshares. It aims to control the board with cards like Skyclave Apparition and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben while also using cards like Aether Vial and Flickerwisp for tempo advantage. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value and flexibility in the deck. Overall, the deck seeks to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan to secure victory.

The main concept of this Legacy deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By combining aggressive creatures like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory with removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Thoughtseize, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while dealing damage quickly. Goblin Bombardment can also be used as a finisher or to get rid of problematic creatures. The mana base includes lands that can provide different colors of mana and disrupt the opponent's mana base with cards like Wasteland.

The deck focuses on utilizing the abilities of Nadu, Winged Wisdom, Nomads en-Kor, and Stock Up to create infinite combos and generate overwhelming card advantage. By manipulating the top of the library with Mystic Sanctuary and Delighted Halfling, the deck can consistently find its combo pieces and disrupt opponents with Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares. The inclusion of Teferi, Time Raveler and Yorion, Sky Nomad provides additional control and value, while Green Sun's Zenith and Natural Order allow for quick access to key creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Endurance.

The deck aims to achieve a quick and explosive win by quickly milling through the entire deck to assemble specific combo pieces, ultimately leading to a win condition using cards like Thassa's Oracle or Dread Return. The deck relies heavily on rituals and mana acceleration cards to quickly cast multiple spells in a single turn. The key strategy revolves around aggressively milling your own library while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize. The goal is to win before the opponent has a chance to react.

The deck is focused on generating a high storm count to cast powerful spells like Tendrils of Agony and Burning Wish to win the game. It uses a combination of fast mana sources like Lotus Petal and Lion's Eye Diamond, alongside rituals like Dark Ritual and Chrome Mox to quickly generate mana and cast multiple spells in a single turn. The deck also includes tutoring effects like Infernal Tutor and Wishclaw Talisman to find key combo pieces, as well as cards like Thoughtseize and Veil of Summer for protection and disruption.

The deck focuses on using aggressive creatures like Knight of the Reliquary, Elvish Reclaimer, and Endurance to quickly pressure the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Crop Rotation and Wasteland. It also has a strong toolbox element with Green Sun's Zenith and Sylvan Library, allowing it to find key pieces like Titania, Voice of Gaea and Dark Depths combo. The deck aims to outmaneuver opponents with its land-based strategy and utilizes cards like Swords to Plowshares and Prismatic Ending for removal.

This deck aims to disrupt opponents by locking down their mana base with cards like Chalice of the Void, Magus of the Moon, and Blood Moon. It then seeks to quickly close out the game by playing aggressive creatures like Pyrogoyf and Sundering Eruption, while also utilizing burn spells like Fury and Shatterskull Smashing. The deck also has ways to ramp up its mana with cards like Simian Spirit Guide and Ancient Tomb, allowing it to quickly deploy its threats and overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.

The focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Thoughtseize, Entomb, and Brainstorm, and then bring them back onto the battlefield with Reanimate and Animate Dead to overwhelm your opponent. The deck also utilizes control elements like Daze, Force of Will, and Wasteland to disrupt your opponent's game plan. Additionally, cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Atraxa, Grand Unifier provide card advantage and synergies with the reanimation strategy. Overall, the deck aims to create explosive plays and win the game through powerful creature reanimation combos.

The deck aims to quickly cheat powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Emrakul into play using Show and Tell and Sneak Attack. It utilizes cards like Ponder, Brainstorm, and Stock Up to find combo pieces while also running Force of Will and Flusterstorm for protection. The deck includes support cards like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Omniscience to further dominate the game. With City of Traitors and Ancient Tomb providing fast mana acceleration, this deck looks to overwhelm opponents with its explosive combo potential and game-ending threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Lotus Petal and Ancient Tomb to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer. This aggressive strategy is supported by disruptive cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of cards like Eye of Ugin and Eldrazi Temple further enhance the deck's ability to cast Eldrazi creatures ahead of schedule, overwhelming the opponent with powerful threats.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combination of artifacts, using cards like Mystic Forge, Voltaic Key, and Basalt Monolith to generate mana and card advantage. The goal is to establish a strong board presence with cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, the Eye of the Storms, while disrupting the opponent's strategy with artifacts like Tormod's Crypt and Soul-Guide Lantern. By efficiently utilizing mana ramp and card draw engines, the deck can quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through a combination of powerful artifacts and strategic plays.
